api

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerImpl

    public interface Server
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Server Interface exposed to Universe and Client

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PORT
      The port used by the RMI registry.
      static java.lang.String SERVICE_NAME
      The service name associated with this Remote interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> check()
      Get the status of server.
      void dispatchResult(Result result)
      Dispatch the Result to corresponding Client Proxy.
      Result getResult(java.lang.String clientname)
      Get the Result of a Task.
      Task<?> getTask()
      Get a Task from Ready Task Queue.
      boolean register(java.lang.String clientname, java.lang.String duration)
      Register a Client in Server.
      void setID(int serverID)
      Set an ID to the Server.
      java.lang.String submit(Task<?> task, java.lang.String clientname)
      Add a Task to the Ready Task Queue.
      boolean unregister(java.lang.String clientname)
      Unregister a Client in Server.

    • Method Detail

      • setID

        void setID(int serverID)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Set an ID to the Server. Call from Universe.
        Parameters:
        serverID - Server Id.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Failed to connect to Server.

      • getTask

        Task<?> getTask()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a Task from Ready Task Queue. Call from Server Proxy in Universe.
        Returns:
        Task
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server.

      • dispatchResult

        void dispatchResult(Result result)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Dispatch the Result to corresponding Client Proxy. Call from Server Proxy in Universe. If the Client is down, discard the result.
        Parameters:
        result - Result to be dispatched.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server.

      • register

        boolean register(java.lang.String clientname,
                 java.lang.String duration)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Register a Client in Server. Call from Client.
        Parameters:
        clientname - Client to be registered.
        duration - Client request runtime
        Returns:
        Status of register.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server.

      • unregister

        boolean unregister(java.lang.String clientname)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Unregister a Client in Server. Call from Client.
        Parameters:
        clientname - Client to be registered.
        Returns:
        Status of register.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server

      • submit

        java.lang.String submit(Task<?> task,
                        java.lang.String clientname)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Add a Task to the Ready Task Queue. Call from Client
        Parameters:
        task - Task to be submitted.
        clientname - Client Name
        Returns:
        Task ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server

      • getResult

        Result getResult(java.lang.String clientname)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the Result of a Task. Call from Client.
        Parameters:
        clientname - Client Name
        Returns:
        Result
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server

      • check

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> check()
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the status of server. Call from Server Proxy in Universe.
        Returns:
        status of Server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Cannot connect with Server
